name: bwEnc
short_description:
An application to convert file encodings. Can be used to convert multiple files at once. Supports over 30 different encodings.

You can add your own file types into the "whitelist" file, which is located in your application directory. The file name is "whitelist.csv". You can also send me your requests for new file types that should be added in future versions.

Caution!
If you are not 100% certain of what you are about to do or if you don't even know what file encodings are then please do yourself a favor and don't even download this application. You can ruin all your files with a single click of a button. This application doesn't create backup files before conversion. You have been warned.
summary: An application to convert file encodings.
